channel.title: Run Problem
channel.description:
Ok, i just started my server 2 days ago, it was running fine and people we logging on, i had about 12 players online on average and today while i was out, i guess my ports shut off or something and now when i run it doesnt work, it says error connecting to server. i never turned it off but when i got back to my server i had people saying it was offline and my run.bat cmd prompt was still running and everything. if anyone can help me you can have hidden admin and rep++
Thanks ~ Dave

item.title: Run Problem
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

im on a Laptop with wifi (idk if wifi has anything to do with it but thought it might help) and the computer downstairs in my house is using the same router as i am.

Read full topic

item.title: Run Problem
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Are you on a wireless network with other devices? Ex. Laptops, iPhone, ect.

Read full topic
